cells.name: Well, looks like you were only mauled a bit. You alright kid?
I’ll take your admiration as a yes. Name’s Thorin, I invented magic so I’m super powerful.
Name’s Thorin glad to know I’m someone’s hero. Guess that the fact that yer not cryin’ like a baby means yer fine.
I blasted that wolf to smithereens with my awesome infernal blast. Name’s Thorin by the way.
How ‘bout I teach you a spell and give ya a magic staff so yer not a wimp who needs savin’?
Now go try it out and set them logs on fire!
Press the doohickey that says “esc” or the gear lookin thing if ya go braindead and forget how ta’ do things.
Go south to my sister, Rose, in town for a better staff. This spare one is a piece a junk. She’s got better spares.
What'cha doin'? Go set them logs afire. If ye already forgot how to do it press the "esc" doohicky.
Now see that green triangle in the corner there? It'll point ya in the direction ya need ta go in.
Try opening your inventory with "e" and drag the staff into you staff equipment slot.
One more thing. There's also dragons. Fire can't hurt 'em. Lemme teach ya this earth spell to fend 'em off.
Yeah they're little but they attack from a distance so watch yer back
Will it do as much damage?
Its a weaker spell but it has a faster recharge but it'll definite do more damage to dragons than hurling fire at 'em.
Yer still here? Do ya got any question fer me?
What am I supposed to do again?
It's scary out there. Will you hold my hand?
Exit the forest to the east then go south ta' see my sister Rose fer a new staff. Just follow the triangle in the upper right corner.
In the upper right. Its inside a circle
The fire spell is more damaging and awesome, but doesn't do much against dragons while earth spell is faster but weaker.
Me and my twin invented magic so we're super powerful. Folks don't like the way I do magic; Sayin' I have no discipline. So I live up in the northern edge of woods away from everyone.
Sure but get that wand first. There's too many enemies ta fight without a more powerful staff
Ah, she's my twin sister, but I'm obviously older because I'm bigger. She's very bookish and doesn't know how ta have fun.
What!? No! I taught ya how ta defend yerself. Man up!
